summary: A combination Hatchet and Pickaxe based on an item from Runescape.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][color=red][b]THIS IS A TWO-IN ONE - WORKS AS A PICKAXE AND AXE (no need to carry both anymore!)[/b][/color]

[youtube]shx_nKIGnig[/youtube] [youtube]GnprVQ8IRPM[/youtube] [youtube]3BaYHVFsWZs[/youtube] [youtube]pQcKBdrV_sY[/youtube][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FZt2Gss.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS![/b]

[b]About:[/b]

The Inferno Adze is a combination Hatchet and Pickaxe that originally came to life in Runescape. I decided to bring it into Skyrim because I thought it could fit well. I changed the design quite drastically to make it fit with the game and went with a Dwarven/Dwemer theme.

Both model and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â A craftable Axe and Hatchet Combination.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]How to Obtain:[/b]

The Inferno Adze is smithable under the "Dwarven" category. It requires 1 Iron Ingot, 1 Steel Ingot, 3 Dwarven Ingot and a Pickaxe. It can be upgraded with 1 Dwarven Ingot.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

infernoadze.esp
meshes/weapons/infernoadze
textures/weapons/infernoadze

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:

infernoadze.esp
meshes/weapons/infernoadze
textures/weapons/infernoadze

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

1. Currently the animation for Mining and Woodcutting uses the default Pickaxe. I'm unsure how to change this without overriding it completely.

2. I wanted the Inferno Adze to also be a torch but had problems with it emitting light and sheathing correctly.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What graphic mod do you use?
A. I use Somber ENB that is tweaked a little.

Q. When are you making a Bandos set of armor?
A. That will be one of my nearest projects.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
